amendment.description: To amend the Fair Labor Standards Act of 1938 to clarify provisions relating to overtime pay.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3107 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 52 - 47. Record Vote Number: 79.

action.text: Amendment SA 3107 proposed by Senator Harkin. (consideration: CR S4742-4752; text: CR S4742) To amend the Fair Labor Standards Act of 1938 to clarify provisions relating to overtime pay.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3107 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 52 - 47. Record Vote Number: 79.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 3107 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 52 - 47. Record Vote Number: 79.
